disease: Basal cell carcinoma of skin, unspecified

symptoms.name: Skin lesion
symptoms.pattern: New growth, change in a previous growth, or recurring sore

symptoms.name: Brown or glossy black bump with rolled border
symptoms.pattern: Common on brown and Black skin

physical_findings: Skin lesion (new growth, change in a previous growth, or recurring sore)
Skin-colored or pink bump (on white skin)
Brown or glossy black bump with rolled border (on brown and Black skin)
risk_factors: Long-term exposure to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from sunlight

required: Presence of a skin lesion consistent with basal cell carcinoma
